reuters.title: NATIONAL WESTMINSTER BANK SAYS IT CUTTING BASE LENDING RATE TO 10.5 PCT FROM 11 PCT.
reuters.body: Keiaisha Co Ltd of Tokyo is issuing 12 mln Swiss francs of straight notes due March 26, 1992 with a 4-5/8 pct coupon, lead manager Gotthard Bank said. The notes can be called from September 26, 1989 at 101-1/4, declining semi-annually. The issue is guaranteed by the Kyowa Bank Ltd. REUTER 
